snippet: A look at the latest developments as the state awaits new Congressional and legislative district lines based on the 2010 census.
abstract: Update of New York State’s attempts to redraw its political maps to reflect the 2010 census; Judge Roanne L Mann files for final proposal for Congressional districts for a panel of federal judges to consider; Gov Andrew M Cuomo says that recently released maps from the Senate and Assembly are acceptable to him but his signature will be contingent on an agreement to pass his proposed amendment to State Constitution.
lead_paragraph: A look at the latest developments as the state awaits new Congressional and legislative district lines based on the 2010 census.

headline.seo: Unmapped: Update on New York Redistricting
headline.main: An Update on New York Redistricting
